name: Everybody Wants Your Pineapple
description:
You have a pineapple. It's a nice pineapple! So nice, that everyone else wants to eat it. Protect your pineapple! But everything has a cost.

This is a short arcade shooter that pits you against waves of hungry guys who want to steal your pineapple. Created in 48 hours for the Game Maker Community Jam #36, to the theme "Everything Has a Cost." 

Everything in the game has a cost, from movement depleting your stamina to killing an enemy creating more enemies in its wake. See how many kills you can rack up before the hungry guys overtake you and your pineapple!

Gameplay music is available under Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 United States license. CC BY-SA 3.0 US.
